Hero.title: The ultimate screenwriting workflow platform
Hero.description: Craft your story, scene by scene. Elevate your screenwriting process with our intuitive tools and collaborative features.

characterProfile.title: Character Profile Generator
characterProfile.description: Create detailed character profiles with ease.

storyStructure.title: Story Structure

sceneEditor.title: Scene Editor

aiTools.title: AI-Assisted Tools
aiTools.description: Enhance your writing with AI-powered suggestions.

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.content: ScriptCraft has revolutionized my writing process. The character profile generator is a game-changer!

testimonial2.name: Michael Lee
testimonial2.content: The scene editor in ScriptCraft makes it so easy to visualize and refine each moment of the story.

testimonial3.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonial3.content: The AI-assisted tools have helped me overcome writer's block countless times. Highly recommended!
